title: Interpretation of a dream about cooked rice for senior imams 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cooked rice in a dream: Rice is considered one of the most delicious and tasty dishes that a person can eat, and rice is considered a basic dish in most countries, especially in Arab countries, where different types of rice can be prepared in many dishes, and rice is also rich in carbohydrates. Which is considered an important nutritional element for the human body. There is a plate of rice that one eats with pleasure and enjoyment, this and other positive things related to rice, but do these positive feelings apply when one sees rice in a dream, especially cooked? We will learn this through the various website about the interpretation of a dream about cooked rice in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cooked rice in a dream: The interpretations and explanations related to seeing rice in a dream in general are many and different, depending on the social, psychological, and financial condition of the dreamer, so we will start first with the interpretation of a dream about cooked rice in a dream: It indicates Cooked rice in a dream indicates many benefits that will come to the dreamer. Cooking rice also indicates that there is money that comes to the pioneer without effort or fatigue. If the rice is white, this indicates a lot of money and kindness. If the dreamer sees rice cooked with meat, this indicates joys and happy occasions like this. Interpretation of a dream Cooked rice in a dreamIt is a sign of a happy life and hard work. Eating rice in a dream indicates distress that does not last long and is quickly released. Burnt rice in a dream indicates many problems on the dreamer’s path. As for seeing completely immature rice in a dream, this indicates incomplete joy that will occur. For the pioneer: Cooked rice also explains positive changes in the dreamer’s life. If cooked rice is yellow in a dream, this indicates a deteriorating health condition. As for cooked rice with chicken, it shows successful achievements. Also, cooked rice can be a sign of getting rid of debt. Yellow rice also indicates a lack of money. If the dreamer sees himself cooking Rice in a dream and he eats it, this indicates the abundance of his offspring and his wealth. As for the bad taste of rice in the dream, it indicates that the dreamer is reckless and makes wrong decisions. Other interpretations related to seeing rice in a dream: Uncooked rice in a dream indicates calmness, mature thinking, and gentleness in dealing. If you see that a person What gave you rice in a dream means that you will bear responsibility in the coming period. Rice is also considered one of the visions that show money that causes fatigue, delusion and anxiety for its owner. Buying rice indicates safety and profits at work. Carrying rice in a dream indicates the difficulty of securing a living. Seeing rice growing in a dream means growth and prosperity. The works of the seer: The death of a rice plant in a dream means unhappiness and despair. Buying or selling rice indicates the fulfillment of desires. Also, rice in a dream indicates good health and longevity. Bags of rice mean that you earn money without effort. If the dreamer is rich, it indicates rice for the poor. If the dreamer is poor, then rice is

title: Interpretation of cats in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: A cat in a dream is a guardian servant, and the interpretation of cats in a dream has many clues. If he catches something, he is a thief in the house, and whoever sees a cat biting him will be sick for a long time. Time no matter how scratched it is, and if the cat does not whine, it is a year of comfort for those who see it. Wild cats are a year of stress and treachery, and whoever sells a cat will spend money, and the Jews said that it is expressed as dimples and thieves because it contains benefit and harm, as in boils, benefit and harm. The interpretation of cats in a dream for males is different as follows. Some information about the interpretation of cats in a dream: Seeing a cat in a dream indicates the presence of a servant to someone who protects and helps him, and whoever died for it in a dream, this may indicate the death of a servant or friend who benefits from him, or the destruction of a place. It contains a benefit or confiscation from vandals. Perhaps it refers to the book of the Almighty’s saying: (And they say, “Our Lord, hasten to us before the Day of Judgment.”) It may be in reference to a kind person who is kind in word and deed and honorable. In the hearts of people. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream about a woman. A woman’s dream about a cat can indicate many things. A cat biting and scratching it can indicate illness or betrayal, and a cat can indicate the Sunnah. If it is a wild cat, it is a bad and bad year, and if it is a cat Home, it is a good year. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. Ibn Sirin also has many interpretations of cats in a dream, which are: There may be a vision of cats that makes many people worry and they also want to find suitable interpretations for it. Ibn Sirin says in his book The Interpretation of Dreams that the appearance of a male cat in a dream indicates On the presence of someone who deceives the dreamer. But for this person to be a friend, it is also a symbol of coldness, cunning, and cunning. If a cat appears in a dream, this is one of the signs indicating good luck and great goodness. And if hungry cats appear in the dream, this means that the dreamer He needs money and cannot find it. If they are small kittens, they are good signs that herald good news related to marriage, success, or pregnancy. The small white cat is a symbol of good company and also indicates safety and innocence. As for the black cat, it shows that there is a person with bad intentions waiting The dreamer is waiting for news about him harming him. Other indicators of the appearance of cats in a dream from Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says in his interpretation of dreams that white cats in a dream mean that the dreamer’s money is safe. If black cats appear, this indicates that the dreamer has an enemy waiting for him. If the cat is Grey, there is tension in family relationships. The appearance of a cat in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will embark on an adventure and succeed in it. The appearance of a Persian cat in a dream means that the dreamer spends his money on charity. And when a person sees that there is a cat attacking him in his dream, this It indicates that he will quarrel with someone. But if the cat in the dream is meowing, this means that there is a friend who claims to love the dreamer. He also uses words behind his back that hurt and offend the dreamer. The presence of a cat in the house where the dreamer lives means that this The house is characterized by calm and comfort. Cats indicate...

title: What do you know about the interpretation of hail in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of cold in a dream. Cold in a dream indicates more than one meaning. Whoever sees cold in his dream, this indicates poverty or his inability to bear responsibility, and the meaning is different, as in the details of the article. Interpretation of a dream of cold in a dream. Seeing cold in a dream indicates the distress in which he lives. The dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he feels extremely cold, the vision is evidence of a state of poverty that the dreamer will live in in the coming period. To see yourself sitting in direct sunlight due to feeling extremely cold, this indicates the end of the insomnia and poverty that you feel. If you see Yourself catching a cold in a dream in the hot summer, then this vision means the arrival of goodness that you did not expect. Seeing rain falling while feeling cold in a dream means many good things and food will come to the dreamer soon. If you see yourself running away from the extreme cold in the dream, This vision indicates that in reality you are running away from problems. Seeing a child getting cold in a dream and then giving him a blanket to keep him warm means that your fears will go away and you will pay your debts because of the good you have done in your life. It is said that the severity of a cold in a dream indicates the severity of poverty or distress. The feeling of warmth after cold means comfort after distress and happiness after sadness. Anyone who sees in a dream that he is trying to cover himself up to protect himself from the extreme cold, then this vision means that he is trying to control all the problems he is going through and will be able to From controlling it soon. Interpretation of seeing cold by Ibn Sirin Cold, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, could be sadness for whoever saw it. If someone dreams in a dream that he is very cold, this vision means that he is going through difficulties and needs someone to support him in his experience. If you see your hands It is getting colder, it means that there is no blessing in the diet. Feeling cold in a dream may mean many disputes that will arise between you and your friends or neighbors. Cold in winter means food and kindness to insight. Interpretation of cold dreams for a single woman. Feeling cold in a dream indicates news The joy that the dreamer will receive, whether he is a man or an unmarried girl. A cold dream in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will get married soon. If an unmarried woman sees that she is very cold and does not want to use any means to warm herself, this indicates that she is suffering from many difficulties in Her life, but she must ask for help from those around her so that she does not bear the heavy burden. It does not cause her serious problems in material or moral terms. Seeing a feeling of warmth after extreme cold indicates true happiness after severe suffering. Shivering in a dream due to extreme cold means that there will be problems for the dreamer, but she needs to be patient and pray, and these problems will not continue. For a long time. Seeing cold and rain in a dream for a single girl means that many of that girl’s wishes will come true. Whoever sees in her dream that she is covering a young girl from the cold, this means that

Interpretation of a dream about someone watching me from a door in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone watching me from a door in a dream can express exposure to problems. And God knows the unseen. Seeing someone watching me from the door in a dream may indicate his bad behavior, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees someone watching her from the door, this may lead to the abuse she is exposed to, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a knock on the door in a dream, this may It indicates that she is being abused and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, seeing someone watching me could express the fear and anxiety of the dreamer, and God knows best. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about having a group with a husband according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a church with a husband in a dream. Seeing intercourse is one of the many visions that we see in a dream, and this vision has many connotations that vary according to many considerations, including that the husband may refuse intercourse with his wife, intercourse may be from behind, and you may be inside. In front of others, and in some cases, they are associated with the deceased husband. What concerns us in this article is that we take a look at all the specific cases and signals of a dream about company with a husband. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about group with a husband, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about group with a husband: Intercourse with a husband expresses the emotional and psychological state of the individual And the many paths one takes to reach peak and emotional recovery. This vision also indicates achieving goal and purpose, meeting needs, removing obstacles from the dreamer’s path, and the ability to obtain pleasure in the simplest way possible. If the dreamer sees that he is emotionally involved with his wife, this may indicate It indicates a lack or many of the needs that he is trying to provide in his relationship with his wife and the desires that he wants to satisfy without losing his balance. Also, seeing the group with the husband indicates achieving the desired goal, fulfilling the absent desire, and rejecting some of the influences that negatively affected the woman’s lifestyle with her husband. And if she sees If a woman has intercourse with her husband, this expresses the attainment of what she aspires to, the ability to reap without difficulty and fatigue, and reaching a stage where she enjoys peace and tranquility. However, if she sees that she is having sex with a man other than her husband, this indicates that she is going in more than one path. Having multiple sources of livelihood, she benefits from the other side and achieves many benefits at the same time. If the fortuneteller is menstruating, and sees her husband having intercourse with her, this indicates that she is closing doors in the husband’s face, obstructing the means of salvation, changing the situation in a miserable way, and exposing herself to greatness. Loss. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with one’s husband by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing intercourse with one’s husband indicates good luck, abundant livelihood, satisfaction of desire and attainment of one’s goal, and multiple means of decent living, contentment and happiness. If it is occupied in a dream or ejaculates from both ends, this requires washing, and there is no interpretation. For the vision, it is one of the soul’s obsessions and miserable dreams. The vision of marriage between a man and his wife expresses the achievement of the desired, the disappearance of adversity and adversity, the end of distress and anguish, facilitation in all other affairs, and the ability to reach the desired situation without obstacles or problems. This vision also indicates walking on the right path, searching for legitimate livelihood, purity of conscience, sincerity of intention, and flexible dealing with the difficult events that the dreamer is going through. If the wife sees that she is getting married with her husband, this symbolizes achieving what she seeks, and mastery. The art or craft that you do, getting rid of long-standing worries and sorrows, and removing despair and distress from them. Heart. But if she sees that her husband is raping her, this indicates that the husband is deprived of the rights of his wife, who does not treat her kindly and urges her to surrender and sacrifice herself permanently without...

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead bringing food in a dream for one girl: A single girl may notice that the deceased delivers food to the house alone, and there are different interpretations for this, including: If an unmarried girl sees her late father bringing her food in a dream, this is a sign that he is always close to her. If a woman dreams For an unmarried woman, the dead person brings her food. This indicates that she will soon marry a man of status and wealth. In addition, if a single woman sees in a dream a dead man who prepares meals for her. This indicates that the girl is overcoming some difficulties in her life. Likewise, if he sees an unmarried dead woman cooking food and eating with her in a dream, this is evidence that his beloved reminds him of many supplications. If a single woman sees that a deceased woman prepares food in a dream, this indicates that her financial situation will improve. title: Interpretation of a dream about leprosy for a single woman

preview.html: A number of people are searching for an interpretation of a dream about leprosy for a single woman. While the gecko, or as it is called leprosy, is one of the most disgusting creatures for some, and seeing it in a dream is disturbing, so it is undesirable and hated. It is a scaly reptile, its body is completely covered with thick scales, it has four limbs and a tail. Long, colorful, it moves quickly when moving from one place to another, in addition to being harmful to humans, so we show you the interpretation of seeing dreams in our article from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of a dream about leprosy for a single woman. Interpretations differed with regard to seeing leprosy patients in a dream for unmarried women. Some commentators said that seeing leprosy portends goodness, while others are evidence of evil and harm, and public opinion went to this opinion. All of this is by the command of God Almighty and does not afflict a person except with the permission of God Almighty. Seeing leprosy, especially for an unmarried girl, caused a lot of anxiety and tension, in addition to fear. Extreme, so many commentators turned to providing different interpretations about this science. But let us know that these interpretations are the interpretations of some scholars and the extent of their truthfulness with God Almighty. The interpretation varies depending on the events of the dream and the events surrounding the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a gecko in one dream: It is said that an unmarried girl who Seeing a gecko in a dream is evidence that she will connect soon, but she will face many problems and this connection will not be completed. Sometimes this is a sign that there is a bad friend in this girl’s life and that he is trying to harm her. If the girl is engaged, this dream may indicate that there is no The connection is complete. It could also symbolize this girl’s failure in her academic year if she continues studying. An unmarried woman who sees a leper in her dream indicates that she will face a number of difficult problems that she will face. If this girl is a worker, then her vision of people with leprosy in Her dream may indicate the presence of an enemy in her work environment who is lurking to harm her. This dream is interpreted as being surrounded by many hypocritical close people who speak ill of her and want to cause her a series of harm. It also indicates the envy, hatred, and magic that appears in this girl. But if An unmarried woman killed a leper in a dream. This is a sign that she will get rid of the fatigue and evil that befalls her and keep her away from evil people in her life. It symbolizes this girl’s failure in her love life and her emotions are exposed to a lot of harm. When there is more than one woman infected with leprosy in a dream, this A sign of the presence of many bad friends in her life. Interpretation of seeing a small lizard in one dream. If an unmarried woman in a dream was able to catch a leper and then run away from him, this is a sign of renewed problems after they were about to end. A girl who sees a leper in a dream is It indicates the color of the people around her and their ability to deceive and deceive. The presence of leprosy in a girl’s dream in her home indicates the presence of disputes and problems among her family members. An unmarried woman escaping from leprosy

title: Interpretation of oil in a dream: Seeing oil in a dream

preview.html: Meanings of oil in a dream, for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, whether she drinks, throws away, or buys from a tanker white oil, black oil, or oil that comes out of it. Land for Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of oil in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about oil in a dream, as Ibn Sirin mentioned, stating that it is not desirable to see it. Seeing it drinking in abundance in a dream is a sign of many problems and misfortunes that will befall the dreamer and it will be difficult for him to escape from them. The dream of seeing the place With oil in a dream indicates committing sins, disobedience, and turning away from God, and the dreamer must repent and ask for forgiveness. Seeing someone bathing with oil in a dream is a sign of the abundance of goodness, abundance of sustenance, and an increase in money and blessings in it. Seeing oil burning in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that It indicates distress, distress, lack of livelihood, and lack of money. Oil: forbidden money, and it is said that it is corrupt. Whoever pours oil on him, the Sultan will harm him. She is in a dream an adulterous woman, and it is said that money is forbidden, and oil is bad and troubles and wars. Oil, because it is difficult money, and perhaps it was worry and sadness, because it is difficult to eat. Interpretation of oil in a dream for Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing black oil in a dream, as Imam Nabulsi pointed out, indicates many worries. And grief and increasing family problems and disagreements. The dream of drinking oil in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a person who commits many sins and must repent and return to God. Seeing oil being poured in a dream indicates many losses that the dreamer may incur, whether in his money or in His friends. Seeing oil fields in a dream indicates a lot of good and abundant sustenance, wealth after poverty, comfort after distress, and the end of worries. Dreaming of seeing oil spray in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is going through many crises and obstacles that prevent him from achieving his ambitions. Interpretation of oil in a dream For a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about oil and extracting it in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will go through a difficult period with many problems, but it will pass soon. Seeing an unmarried woman being sprayed with oil in a dream is evidence that someone is pursuing her and trying to get her into trouble and harm. The dream of eating oil In a dream for an unmarried woman, it is evidence that she will obtain a lot of money, but through illegal means. Seeing working in an oil company in a dream for single people indicates good luck, fulfillment of desires and ambitions, and achieving goals. Interpretation of oil in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing oil in the house in a dream For a married woman, it indicates many differences and problems with her husband and her feeling of sadness and unhappiness. The dream of buying oil in a dream for a married woman is evidence of many good things for her, abundant food, an increase in blessings, and blessings in money and children. To dream of lighting a fire with oil in a dream for a woman Married, means that she may be exposed to an important personal secret being revealed. A dream in which an oil well is seen by a married woman indicates that her husband is hiding many of his secrets from her and the feeling of mystery is...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wedding in a dream - a symbol of marriage in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wedding party in a dream - a symbol of marriage in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of marriage on the Mozaat website. We often see dreams and may dream of marriage, but we are confused about the interpretation of the dream of marriage and other dreams. The dream of marriage does not depend on who will get it married or only with good people. Even a married man can dream of marriage. You can see: Interpretation of dreams to see the death of a husband in a dream - a symbol of the death of a husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marriage by Al-Nabulsi says: Imam Al-Nabulsi. If a person sees in his dream that he is marrying a good-looking, unmarried girl. This vision shows a lot It is good and shows that the person has many dreams that he aims to achieve in his life. Seeing marriage to a dead girl in a dream means that something difficult for the person will be achieved, and indeed it was impossible for this to happen. But if the unmarried young man dreams in his dream of marrying His sister. This vision indicates a visit to the Holy House of God or suggests that the dreamer travels and achieves many goals. If a person sees in a dream that his wife married another man, this vision indicates an increase in sustenance and money. And if she sees that she married her father or her father, this indicates However, she obtained an inheritance from them. If an unmarried girl sees that she has married someone she does not know, then this vision indicates the fulfillment of ambitions and the ability to strive for success in life. But if she sees that she is marrying someone she loves, then this dream means that she will not marry him. Seeing a wedding with a married person in a single person’s dream indicates hard efforts and difficulties in life. But if the person is a stranger and you do not know him, this indicates entering into a romantic relationship or flirtation soon. Seeing marriage to a Jewish girl indicates that the dreamer will commit many Of forbidden deeds. This vision shows that the dreamer is committing many abominations. As for the vision of marrying a Christian, it is committing many false things or following the path of heresy. Seeing a married woman getting married again to her husband indicates pregnancy soon. If she is at an age other than the age of pregnancy, then this It indicates stability and happiness in life and indicates a new livelihood for her and her husband. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing marriage in a pregnant woman’s dream is an increase in sustenance and ease in matters, and indicates getting rid of worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about marriage according to psychology and dream interpretersInterpretation Dreams is a term known since ancient times and is used to find out the meaning of dreams that humans cannot interpret. It is a science in which some people who have been gifted by God with the ability to interpret dreams have excelled. Since ancient times, they have used the term visions to interpret dreams and the belief that dreams are divided into two parts. True vision It is one of With God Almighty, it is a dream of something good and beautiful. A wrong vision, which is the work of Satan and brings evil to man. Dreams in general carry messages that alert the dreamer, and therefore the person must believe in the interpretation of dreams. And when you wake up from sleep and see a wedding in a dream, this makes you feel more happy.

title: Interpretation of a dream about eggs by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of eggsEggs are considered one of the important foods in every trip and everyone loves them, whether big or small, and we use them in many foods, as for seeing eggs in a dream, it is one of the good dreams, but due to the condition and color of the eggs, we will then explain many matters related to seeing eggs in a dream... Follow usInterpretation of the dream of eggsEggs in a dream are dreams that indicate a series of events that occur in the fortuneteller's life. Many interpreters believe that seeing eggs in a dream symbolizes that a person is going through a good period in his life during which he feels joy and happiness. If the dreamer sees Easter eggs in a dream, it is fortunate that happy events will be his share and that he will get a lot of good things. When a person sees the eggs of a small fish in a dream, this means that there will be a lot of money that will come to him soon. If the dreamer sees eggs in his dream without knowing their source, this symbolizes that the dreamer will get many benefits as he does not depend on God's command. If someone sees bird eggs in a dream, this means that he loves activity and always tries hard to achieve what he desires. Eating eggshells in a dream is considered disturbing, indicating some concerns and problems.Interpretation Eggs dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained that seeing eggs in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will be in a better condition and will enjoy his life a lot. When an unmarried young man sees clean and beautiful eggs in a dream, this means that the dreamer will get married soon, God knows best. The presence of eggs in the refrigerator during a dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to hide some of his secrets and does not want to reveal them to anyone. If the dreamer sees scorpion eggs in his dream, this means that he will soon have a child, but he is a little naughty. What is the interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a single woman? Eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream are a sign of kindness, blessing, and abundant food that will be her share. When an unmarried woman sees someone giving her eggs in her dream, this means that she will soon marry a young man she loves. If a married woman dreams that she is boiling eggs, this means that she will get rid of the crises she was going through. But if a girl sees that someone she does not know was giving her eggs in a dream, this indicates that there will be an improvement in her material life soon, by God’s command. When unmarried women cook eggs in a dream, this means that she is trying to get rid of bad deeds and improve Her personality. What is the interpretation of seeing raw egg yolk in a dream for a single woman? Raw eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicate that there are some crises in the dreamer’s life. If a girl sees raw eggs in her dream, this is a sign that she may be robbed in the near future and should be more careful. If there is a raw egg yolk in an unmarried woman’s dream while cooking it, this is a sign that she is trying to work harder and endure hardships until she gets what she wants. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing broken eggs for a single woman? Seeing broken eggs is considered
